full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAL BA'I GSUNG RAB KUN GYI NYING KHU KHRID CHEN BZHI'I NYAMS LEN BYED TSHUL GYI RIM PA GSAL BAR STON PA SKAL LDAN 'JUG NGOGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @179A *, ,(CES RGYAL BA'I GSUNG RAB THAMS CAD KYI NYING KHU KHRID CHEN BZHI'I NYAMS LEN BYA TSUL GYI RIM PA GSAL BAR BKOD PA SKAL LDAN 'JUG NGOGS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, BSTAN 'GRO'I DON KHUR DU 'KHYER BA'I LHAG BSAM RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA YONGS KYI DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN CHEN PO NOM CHI MER GEN MKHAN PO SPRUL SKUS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG 'BRI DGOS ZHES BKA' GNANG CHER BYUNG BZHIN, RIGS DANG DKYIL 'KHOR RGYA MTSO'I BYED PO NGES PA DON GYI RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO BKA' @179B DRIN MTSUNGS MED ^PAndI TA MER GEN MKHAN PO RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG PHUN TSOGS DPAL BZANG POS STZAL BA'I BLA MCHOD KHRID YIG LA GZHI BYAS TE, DAM PA GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG DU MA LAS BTUS SHING, ^BLA MA RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO LAS SNGA PHYIR MNOS PA'I MAN NGAG GI GNAD MANG POS BRGYAN CING BRIS PA 'DI ^PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I ZHAL NAS, RANG NYID NYAMS LEN MED PAR GZHAN LA 'DOMS, ,YE SHES SPYAN LDAN DRUNG NA NGO YANG TSA, ,'ON KYANG BDE BAR GSHEGS PA'I BSTAN PA NI, ,LUNG TZAM GYIS KYANG DON DANG LDAN NO ZHES, ,ZLA MED STON PA DE YIS BSNGAGS PAS NA, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA LTAR RANG DANG SKAL MNYAM BLO DMAN 'GA' ZHIG LA'ANG PHAN SRID SNYAM NAS, 'JIG RTEN CHOS BRGYAD KYI BRANG DU KHOL BA BTZUN GZUGS KALBA BHA DRA'I @180A *, ,MING CAN GYIS BGYIS PA 'DIS KYANG RANG GZHAN KUN LA PHAN PA RGYA CHEN PO 'BYUNG ZHING RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA'I SNYING PO ^'JAM MGON BLA MA'I BSHAD SGRUB KYI BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
